text:
Stella Yvette Herrell (born March 16, 1964) is an American politician, businesswoman, and real estate agent. She is the U.S. Representative for New Mexico's 2nd congressional district since 2021. She is a member of the Republican Party.
She was a member of the New Mexico House of Representatives for District 51 from January 18, 2011 until January 15, 2019.
